title: Ready to lease! Beautifully designed 3 bed 2 bath apartment
posting_body: ['Stonecreek on the Green', 'show contact info', 'Unit Details:', '3-BR 2-BA |', 'Square Footage:', '1354 sq ft |', 'Rental Rates:', '$2250 - $2600/Month!', 'Lease Length:', '12-Month, 13-Month', 'Apartment Features:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Carpet', '➢ Dining Room', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Fireplace in Select Units', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Range', '➢ Window Coverings', "➢ 9' Ceilings with Crown Molding", '➢ Balcony in Select Units', '➢ Breakfast Bar', '➢ Ceiling Fans & Track Lighting Standard', '➢ Elegant Fireplaces & Verandas in Select Units', '➢ Huge Garden Tubs with Ceramic Tile', '➢ Scenic Views in Select Units', '➢ Shower/Roman Tubs', '➢ Walk -In Laundry Room with Storage Space', '➢ Washer/Dryer Hookup', 'About Our Community:', 'Are you searching for a beautiful apartment in Snellville, GA?', 'Stonecreek on the Green offers everything you need at a great price.', 'With first-class amenities in a beautiful setting, our residents enjoy breathtaking views in a prime location.', 'Take advantage of spacious floor plans, complete with a breakfast bar, roman tubs, a laundry room, and much more.', 'Expect more at Stonecreek on the Green!', 'Wonderful Amenities:', '➢ Additional Storage', '➢ Controlled Access', '➢ Fitness Center with Free Weights', '➢ Gazebo', '➢ Grills', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ Playground', '➢ Resident Business Center', '➢ Beautiful Park-like Setting', '➢ Car Care Center', '➢ Convenient to Shopping, Dining & Entertainment', '➢ Eat-in Kitchen with Built-In Lazy Susan', '➢ Great Neighbors', '➢ Handicap Friendly', '➢ Resort-Style Pool', 'Contact Information:', 'Address:', '3974 Annistown Rd', 'Snellville, GA 30039', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'BF897BF249EF48A']
